channel.title: Ip
channel.description: How to change source ip and client ip ? I already changed the source ip to mine And the client ip to 0.0.0.0 But got Errror Connection to server... Why?

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Your personal client: = 127.0.0.1
Any client you give somebody else = the ip you are porting

Read full topic

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Pkor159, post:10, topic:525235”]This is what i understood:
You have 2 clients one is 127.0.0.1 ip and second is your ip.
THe thing that you cant login woth the second client is that it only works on other computers not urs. It’s like calling yourself from your phone.[/quote]
No. All it does when you change the IP you connect to is that the client connects to that certain IP address. 127.0.0.1 resolves to what’s known as localhost which is what you would use to connect to your server for testing purposes (your server IP address would also be set to localhost). When the IP address is set to 127.0.0.1, only your computer can connect. If you want other players to connect, you’d have to change the IPs in both the server and client to something other than localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @sami1320 sami1320
item.description:
@sami1320 wrote:

But i tested already , i went to source and can’t find the ip only found : Server listener to Mineip:43594
Changed this to my ip
This was only in source

Went to client and found in Client.Java and Gui.Java
ip’s changed to mine and now
Error connection to server.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“sami1320, post:7, topic:525235”]Well i won’t public i just want to test it with my cousin …
And 2 clients because the moderator told me one for me i login from it and when i will give to my cousin[/quote]
I’ll assume your using different computers. That means the server should be using a public IP address and the clients should be connecting to the server using the same IP address.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip

And if i want it public should be my ip
So i have to get 2 clients
And now i have the 2 client as he told me but i got problem that both are error connection to server

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Wait, are you trying to put it online for other people, or just for yourself to test and work with? If it’s the latter, then both IPs (client and source) should be set to localhost.

Read full topic

That means that my ip not working
But as i checked here : http://www.runelocus.com/tools/statuschecker.html?COLLCC=3689770623&COLLCC=3708513899&
My ip is online and playable!
